CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 14, 1953, pg. 23, reads: "HURRICANE - Pittsburghers and out-of-towners alike flocked to the grand opening Monday of the new Hurricane Club at 1603 Centre Avenue. This Exquisite addition to Pittsburgh's night spots lays claim to being one of the most modern restaurant - bars for many miles around... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Women and men crowded around booths and tables, with Ruby Young Trio performing in background, at opening night of Hurricane Club
